data.title: Il Viticondo by MARCHESE, Annibale: Near Fine Hardcover (1738) 1st Edition
data.meta_description: Free Shipping - 1st Edition - Hardcover - Nella stamparia di Gennaro, e Vincenzo Muzio - 1738 - Condition: Near Fine - 1738 Wedding Charles III 1ed Il Viticondo Marchese Spain Naples Sicily Bourbon Annibale Marchese s  Il Viticondo  is a rare 18th-century Italian poem written for the wedding of Charles III King of Spain to Maria Amalia of Saxony. The marriage allowed Charles III to become King of Naples and Maria Amalia the Queen of Spain, Naples, and Sicily. Marchese s poem was popular throughout Europe and became an icon for celebrating the union of the House of Bourbon and Saxony. This 1738 first edition was published in conjunction with the wedding and is considerably rare with no other examples found for sale worldwide! data.text:
About this Item

1738 Wedding Charles III 1ed Il Viticondo Marchese Spain Naples Sicily Bourbon Annibale Marchese s Il Viticondo is a rare 18th-century Italian poem written for the wedding of Charles III King of Spain to Maria Amalia of Saxony. The marriage allowed Charles III to become King of Naples and Maria Amalia the Queen of Spain, Naples, and Sicily. Marchese s poem was popular throughout Europe and became an icon for celebrating the union of the House of Bourbon and Saxony. This 1738 first edition was published in conjunction with the wedding and is considerably rare with no other examples found for sale worldwide! Item number: #23044 Price: $950 MARCHESE, Annibale Il Viticondo In Napoli: Nella stamparia di Gennaro, e Vincenzo Muzio, 1738. First edition.
